settings.title: Dolphin Bed Frequently Asked Questions FAQs
What is the Dolphin Bed System?
settings.answer: The Dolphin Bed System is an advanced therapeutic mattress designed to redistribute pressure and promote healing by simulating the feeling of being immersed in a fluid medium.

settings.title: How does the Dolphin System work?
settings.answer: It uses Fluid Immersion Simulation (FIS) technology to create a personalized immersion profile for each patient, minimizing tissue deformation and promoting near-normal blood flow.

settings.title: Who can benefit from using the Dolphin Bed?
settings.answer: The Dolphin Bed is ideal for patients with pressure ulcers, post-operative grafts or flaps, spinal cord injuries (with physician clearance), and those requiring pain management or advanced wound care.

settings.title: How long does the battery last?
settings.answer: The system has a 12-hour battery life, allowing therapy to continue during patient transport.

settings.title: What conditions is the Dolphin System designed for?
settings.answer:
It is particularly effective for:

  • Pressure ulcers (up to Stage IV)
  • Post-operative flaps and grafts
  • Chronic pain conditions
  • Stabilized spinal cord injuries

settings.title: Can the Dolphin System be used in various healthcare settings?
settings.answer: Yes, it is designed for ICU, Med/Surg, bariatric, homecare and other clinical environments.

settings.title: How do I clean and maintain the system?
settings.answer: The mattress and control unit should be cleaned according to the manufacturer’s guidelines, using approved cleaning agents to ensure durability and performance.

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
